page.title: 17WEST MONKTON VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The origional village hall was built after the second world war, and was used as an army hut. It was a small metal and wood building,known as the Victory Village Hall. In 1977,the year of the Queen's jub- ilee,the local people wanted to build a new village hall. They had lots of fund raising events.The new village hall was eventually built.The people in the village wanted to keep the old name, but it was made for the jubilee, so finally they called it The Victory Jubilee Village Hall. Now it is the centre of village life. Drama productions,toddler and mother groups,youth club,yoga and badminton clubs all take place in the hall. The hall can be hired out when it is free,especially Saturday nights.Wedd- ing parties and reunions have been held there.
